question: The Land Ports Authority of India works under which Union Ministry?
option2: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
option3: Ministry of Ports Shipping and Waterways
explanation:
The Land Ports Authority of India was founded in 2012. It is a statutory body working under the Ministry of Home Affairs.
It is responsible for creating, upgrading, maintaining and managing border infrastructure in India. It manages several Integrated Check Posts all across Borders of India. The 9th foundation say of the Land Ports Authority of India was observed on March 1, 2021.
